ai-ne27:1.1_0: Herein, what is the practice of the dwellings?
ai-ne27:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood as right thought.”
ai-ne27:2.2_0: He should then be destroyed by one who is skilled in what is skillful.
ai-ne27:2.3_0: he should be deport from skill in what is unskillful.
ai-ne27:2.4_0: The dwellings shakes off his meal.
